website_summaries.verdict: Tops our list for its unbeatable blend of style, size, and functionality. Choose this picnic basket if you want a quality option that does it all.
pros: Attractive woven willow construction delivers superior durability
Includes elegant essentials for four: porcelain plates, stainless steel flatware, glass stemware, wine opener,  salt/pepper shakers
Compartmentalized design has a cold storage bag
cons: Wine glasses are on the small side, but this can be a plus if you want to pack extra goodies

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal picnic basket set for 4!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this picnic basket set is phenomenal. My wife loves the set and the basket looks great as well.
customer_reviews.author: John Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful basket
customer_reviews.text: This basket is a very good size. It's large but you need that if you want to carry any food in it. The plates are ceramic and the wine glasses are real glass and both were packaged well do they wouldn't break. The whole set is beautiful. I am using it for a silent auction and filled it with various picnic items and a small cutting board and knives for cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality basket! I really appreciate having ceramic plates and actual glasses as opposed to plastic. My only criticism is that I wish the plates had some protection between the plates, but I just wrapped them in the paper that came in the shipping box.The wicker is a really nice rich dark brown color, and the inside fabric seems well constructed. The zip up cooler is a plus! Without food, it feels lightweight. Everything arrived in tact. This is a wedding gift, and after seeing this in person, I want one of my own! Will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: SCBS_1005

customer_reviews.title: Loved this picnic basket!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this picnic basket and I very pleased with it's quality! It was much larger than I expected and the items inside where also in great condition. The plates are good quality; the silverware is a little less quality but they aren't being used daily so should be fine. The wine glasses are very small but are glass. The insulated area will hold a good amount of food too! Would recommend this basket!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Bonno

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like it
customer_reviews.text: First, this picnic basket is gorgeous and spacious! The customer service is stellar and so even that alone is enough to make me want to recommend this basket to anyone. I'm a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Love2shop

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Bad price, bad product
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to be shipped and when it arrived it looked like it was sitting on a shelf for ages collecting dust. The thing I hate most is there is no kind of handle just a big ass wooden box. Realistically you wouldn't be able to use it for a picnic or beach day because if you pack it fully with the plating and glass cups, you have no handle to carry it correctly and risk easily dropping it. You wouldn't make it far carrying a heavy and filed big picnic basket.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Collazo

customer_reviews.title: Classy Picnic Basket
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive and well organized picnic basket! I really like that there is a secure space for the 4 place settings with sturdy straps to hold everything in its place. It has a insulated section to keep food cool. I expect to get a lot of use out of its nice features this fall!
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Missing key pieces
customer_reviews.text: Outside wicker was chipped and scratched; pepper shaker was missing its top, rendering it useless; plates do not fit properly in the straps. Manufacturer's customer service emailed us asking to confirm that it arrived in good shape, and when we explained that we don't need to return the whole thing but would like at least a replacement pepper shaker, they ignored our multiple emails.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A very good deal.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 4-person Wicker Picnic Basket from estyleworld on Amazon Marketplace for a good price. I have been in love with the design since I saw it for the first time. When I placed my order on 9 October 2019 (Jakarta time), it was 8 October 2019 (local time of the country of origin of the item I purchased). I was advised that the item would arrive at its destination in a period of 11 - 16 October 2019, and it did arrive at 16 October 2019 in good order and perfect condition. I could also easily track my order, thanks to Amazon.com's well-organised tracking feature. I may want to order another item in the future.
customer_reviews.author: PW Pamungkas

customer_reviews.title: Great, but broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I LOVE this basket. Great size, great design... But, sadly, one of the plates was missing entirely, and only 3 of the glasses shipped (and shattered). So, despite being a basket for four people, I only have 3 plates and one glass. Hoping that Amazon will send me replacements, as the product description was listed "like new."
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Portwood

customer_reviews.title: A Great Basket At A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This basket basically comes with everything that you need. The traps on the inside hold everything in place, and the cold pack insulation piece is what makes this a better buy than other baskets advertised at similar prices. Great for day dates, and makes it easy to tote everything
customer_reviews.author: Craigy P

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality, fragile glass.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful picnic basket. It’s professional quality and the supplies inside are as well. Sadly I am unable to fit the plates inside their leather perch without some stretching and shoving, and that causes stress as I don’t want to break the plates. The wine glasses are made very finely and I wonder if they will hold together well with travel and movement. Otherwise, it’s a wonderful picnic waiting to happen!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Grotberg

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY NICE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised as to the quality of this product, the basket is beautiful and very nicely finished (lining, handle, etc.)......the package arrived safely with no broken pieces as the wine glasses are actually glass and the plates are ceramic or something similar. The only downside if there is one.....I feel the blanket, napkins, and cutlery are a bit on the cheap side....but overall I still feel that while looking at the entire package it is a good value!
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality, top notch customer service
customer_reviews.text: To be up front, this is a positive review although not for the quality of the product itself. I had issues with getting the plates into the designated slots. Like others have mentioned, they didn't fit well and I did more than a little trying to force them in. However, the customer service is hands down impressive. They contacted me before I received the basket, and after I received it I let them know of the issue and that I was going to return it. They refunded my money within hours.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Plate straps are too small
customer_reviews.text: the basket is almost there. My only problem is that when trying to strap on the plates. Its too tight forcing me to push in the plate harder. I'm pretty sure at on point I'll either rip the belts from the anchor or break a plate. I'm not sure if I received a defective unit... Wait I’m now reading our reviews and see others having the same problem... I’m interested in knowing how has the product supplier made it right for other customers... please reply
customer_reviews.author: john torres

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s only “ok”. I originally purchased one online from pottery barn, and the shipping was delayed for after the original date I needed it for so I canceled that one and found this on amazon to ship quick. The basket I got was poorly made; they glued the fabric portion crooked, the slots to hold the plates are too tight so it’s a struggle to get the plates in and out, wicker had a few flaws that I ended up staining.. Just a poor product made out of poor materials
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Winslow

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loved the whole evening planned around the picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved the whole evening planned around the picnic basket. I was impressed; I was able to store bottle of wine, a bowl of chicken salad, lettece in a Ziploc and crackers in the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Snider

customer_reviews.title: Broken Glasses
customer_reviews.text: All and all everything looked good but I was worried as other review mentioned broken items. One of our three wine glass were broken. Hopefully this can be corrected without fully returning. Then I will provide a real review. Update: Seller made everything write sent a replacement glass. We are loving out picnic basket everything in it seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best for $$$
customer_reviews.text: This was a 9th anniversary present for my bride, and she loved it!!! We’ve gone on a couple picnics already and we’ll worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Tim WI

customer_reviews.title: An excellent picnic basket!
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding product, nicely designed and well crafted. The plates are ceramic and the stem glasses are actually made of glass. I'm extremely satisfied with this purchase. This is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hayward

customer_reviews.title: I really like the separate compartment for keeping things cold or warm
customer_reviews.text: It seems very well made. It is large enough to hold what you need. I really like the separate compartment for keeping things cold or warm. W en though it is large the handle on top for carrying like a suitcase makes it VERY handy and easy for carrying. The only thing I am not too excited about is the faux leather connectors, but sometimes faux is quite strong.
customer_reviews.author: dawn rondinella

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price. Colors are accurate. Glasses are small (dessert wine size) but durable.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Price of the item and quality
customer_reviews.text: Hello. I purchased this product for a birthday gift and am very disappointed with it. The birthday is tomorrow. The packaging of the product was poorly done. It has stains inside, there are broken pieces from the basket, not durable, the wines glasses and the plates are not the same size as it appeared before ordering.. this was my first time buying thru Amazon. I Am very disappointed. And it wasn’t cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but practicality might be lacking
customer_reviews.text: The look is great. This set includes all the items you might need but for practical use I think a couple changes would be good. The plates are glass thus subject to breakage. The one carry handle on front end works for the items in the case but would spill any food being carried in the open spaces provided. Handles on the ends would solve this.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Baker

customer_reviews.title: Came packed very well and works really well. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Came packed very well and works really well. The leather straps for the plates were too tight for the plates but other than that works perfectly. Just pack the plates a little differently until the leather stretches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package it better.
customer_reviews.text: Well I liked the size of the basket. Did not like that it had no side handles and to had to carry it like briefcase. The way that it wAs packaged was horrible! I understand it was a wiker basket but a lot of pieces where broken by the time I opened the box! Like better package instructions have to seriously be taken into consideration!
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. P.

customer_reviews.title: The customer service from the owners
customer_reviews.text: I like the most that when I said there was something wrong with my order the owner just replaced it with no issues and I really appreciate that
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Smooth purchase.... got it for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Smooth purchase .... got it for my wife for valentines . Big hit. Top quality and very sharp
customer_reviews.author: architect guy 1

customer_reviews.title: Love this picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: Love this picnic basket. It is absolutely adorable. Lots of room for food and wine. Also, one of the wine glasses arrived broken, but the seller replaced immediately without questions asked. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: THUMBS UP!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful basket, looks like it costs $300+, but its nicely priced!! I can't wait to take it out!!
customer_reviews.author: TanC

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I decided to get this basket
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I decided to get this basket. It is amazing! The plates, glasses, utensils and everything is beautiful and unexpectedly good quality! A must have!
customer_reviews.author: JBTech

customer_reviews.title: Everything is perfect. I ordered expedited shipping since it wasn't going ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect. I ordered expedited shipping since it wasn't going to arrive in 2 days with prime and it arrived in 2 days, early Saturday and within 5 minutes of sitting down we were already receiving compliments from people passing by on our beautiful picnic basket. Perfect basket for a fabulous price! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tara E Allen

customer_reviews.title: A ok buy
customer_reviews.text: There was actually a stain on the inside cloth seems like it may have been sitting up for a while. I thought this came with straps but it didn’t which makes it kind of uncomfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Mo

customer_reviews.title: This was a shower gift for my niece and her ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a shower gift for my niece and her fiancee. They christened it the "cutest gift" of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm very pleased with this purchase. It's exactly like the picture. I can't wait to use it! One of the glasses broke in transit, but customer service was great. They got back to me quickly, and are sending a replacement. All is good.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and well packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy basket and well made. Perfect for going out with another couple or just want some alone time with your mate. Exactly what we wanted. Cant wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Have used it 3 or 4 times so far and it works out great. Friends all ask where we got it and ...
customer_reviews.text: A real bargain. Have used it 3 or 4 times so far and it works out great. Friends all ask where we got it and I refer them to you.
customer_reviews.author: My2Sense4U

customer_reviews.title: I love it but it is much bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love it but it is much bigger than I expected. It worked very well for an event that we attended.
customer_reviews.author: Edwena

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful basket however plated did not fit in the provided slots. Looks like a manufacturing defect. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rosu

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely purchase this item again
customer_reviews.text: Basket is exactly how it is pictured. Very pretty. Need to pack the wine glasses a little better for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ruhlig

customer_reviews.title: I love the picnic basket and everything inside however 2 of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the picnic basket and everything inside however 2 of the wine glasses were broken when it was delivered so I would like 2 replacement glasses please; thank you
customer_reviews.author: LRP2011

customer_reviews.title: for the couple that has everything, great gift.
customer_reviews.text: we gave this as a wedding gift. the couple loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Famousk1

customer_reviews.title: Real nice basket.
customer_reviews.text: Fast service, everything was fine, nothing broken. Looks to be good quality. Haven't used it yet but looking forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk McMath

customer_reviews.title: It looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look and style of this picnic basket can't wait to use it I think I'm gonna have a picnic in my living room this weekend since I can't go out. Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: keisha Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding shower gift!
customer_reviews.text: Such s great Bridal shower gift! My future daughter in law loved it! While the glasses are a bit small, you can always buy larger ones. Super great quality!
customer_reviews.author: A. CANNON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Just as I hoped. Lots of room for picnic treats. Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Owner sent a letter of apology and made everything perfect beyond my expections!
customer_reviews.author: betty times 5

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Will be using it this upcoming weekend ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Will be using it this upcoming weekend on the back of our Porsche 356 - strapped into the luggage rack.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Messana

customer_reviews.title: The vinyl straps will easily wear and break down
customer_reviews.text: Not as well made as advertised. The vinyl straps will easily wear and break down.
customer_reviews.author: PattyeFort

customer_reviews.title: Love this basket!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful basket and quick delivery. Glasses and plates were well packed and arrived intact. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adrieene

customer_reviews.title: Love this basket
customer_reviews.text: This basket came perfectly packaged and received so many compliments. Arrived in perfect condition with no flaws. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for father’s day. Great for wine tastings and picnics
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Nice basket ,broken on arrival 😟
customer_reviews.text: Just received the basket but the wine glasses are all broken. The basket itself seems fine , just waiting to see how they handle the replacement of the wine glasses .
customer_reviews.author: mrs.gregory e hay

customer_reviews.title: Arrived missing one out of four plates and the metal ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived missing one out of four plates and the metal clasp on the strap fell off in my hand as soon as I touched it. Overall appears cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely, very cute little picnic basket. Just right for lunch with either your other half or small family.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Saldanha

customer_reviews.title: The product came in great shape and was very high quality and well made
customer_reviews.text: A++ seller very friendly and honest. The product came in great shape and was very high quality and well made. I'm very satisfied. Would definetly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Adam_Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This basket is so adorable. Exactly like the picture. It's way bigger than I thought it was going to be. However, one of my plates broke. Is there a way to get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the basket and all the goodies inside...very well done!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Buckles too small to fit plates
customer_reviews.text: The plates don’t fit in well could not get them to fit in the buckle
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great basket as expected. However all 4 of the wine glasses were shattered upon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE MY BASKET!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY IN LOVE!!! This picnic set is gorgeous!! All the pieces came safely pack and unbroken. I just received it today and will be using it tomorrow ❤
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: That button broke just putting the plates in right when I received it😟
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for a birthday gift for my daughter and she loved it. I will have to say the wine ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the picnic basket for a birthday gift for my daughter and she loved it. I will have to say the wine glasses are a bit smaller than I thought they would be. Otherwise I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute basket with plenty of room. Its wide enough to hold a wine bottle which was perfect for us. The wine glasses are actual glass which was a nice touch. Our salt and pepper shakers came damaged. The sewing job on the material was a cheaply done. For the price of the basket I expected it to look a little nicer. Overall a nice basket with everything you need for a perfect picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Our first basket was missing Velcro on one of the straps that held the wine glasses in place. The replacement that came had deformed plates and the straps were not long enough to get more than one plate secured to the lid. Will be returning the second one as well and buying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: 2 of the 4 glasses were broke, no napkins ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 4 glasses were broke, no napkins included and the plates are so small. Should have looked at the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Some damage to the basket and 1 of the wine glasses was shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry P

product_meta.title: 4 Person Wicker Picnic Basket | Deluxe Woven Willow Vintage Picnic Baskets |Extra-Large 22 X 15 - Porcelain Plates, Real Glass Wine Glasses, Stainless Steel Silverware, Opener - Free Cold Storage Bag
feature_bullets: LOVE THIS PICNIC BASKET SET OR YOUR MONEY BACK - We designed this Gourmet luxury woven willow deluxe outdoor lunch box set/organizer to be larger than most. You'll have everything you need to enjoy the perfect picnic including great tableware and cutlery.

4 PERSON ANTIQUE HAMPER- Highest quality durable vintage style outdoor insulated picnicking baskets that you can enjoy for years to come. This is a high quality wooden wicker basket with handle and a cold-storage lining and all your picnic supplies.
PORCELAIN AND STAINLESS STEEL UTENSILS - Set of 4 plates forks spoons and knives with glass stemware. You can enjoy a picnic with the same quality as in a restaurant.
EXTRA LARGE BASKETS WITH INSULATED STORAGE BAG - large cotton lined containers come with cold storage or wine bag so that you can keep meats and drinks cold and ready to enjoy.
FOR CAMPING OR CONCERTS - Best decorative picnic basket for outdoor meals road trips lake houses and the beach that will allow you to enjoy. Canastas para organizar.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars130 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
